items.title: The real reason Google DeepMind is working with a fusion energy startup
items.summary: Google has invested in fusion startups as potential power suppliers. This latest move suggests Google sees them as potential customers, too.

items.summary:
Baseus Picogo 0.3-inch 5,000mAh MagSafe Power Bank

Buy for $15 (Reg. $20+)

Apply code NE6FGGPA during checkout.

What we love

Slim and compact power banks are popping up left and right, and even better, the prices are coming down. Today’s offer locks in a 5,000mAh MagSafe model from Baseus that measures just 0.3 inches thick.

items.title: Rent a Cyber Friend will pay you to talk to strangers online and will show off its platform at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.summary: "Loneliness is the biggest disease in the world right now," founder Francesco Vitali said. "So we built a platform where human time has value again, and a place where being human is important."

items.title: Apple and NBCUniversal announce an Apple TV and Peacock Premium bundle for $14.99 per month, a 30% discount over the individual subscriptions (Alex Weprin/The Hollywood Reporter)
items.summary:
Alex Weprin / The Hollywood Reporter:
Apple and NBCUniversal announce an Apple TV and Peacock Premium bundle for $14.99 per month, a 30% discount over the individual subscriptions  —  In addition to getting both services at a discount of more than 30 percent, Apple TV will add select Peacock programming, while Peacock will get selected Apple TV shows.

Buy for $20 (Reg. $40)

What we love

These under-sink organizers are great for kitchens, bathrooms, and more. In fact, I’m using something similar in my bathroom at home. So if you’re running tight on space, these can help and I like that they opt for a metal construction instead of plastic.

items.title: Source: OpenAI has proposed a "sign in with ChatGPT" feature to some companies, which could then transfer the cost of using OpenAI's models to their customers (Stephanie Palazzolo/The Information)
items.summary:
Stephanie Palazzolo / The Information:
Source: OpenAI has proposed a “sign in with ChatGPT” feature to some companies, which could then transfer the cost of using OpenAI's models to their customers  —  OpenAI CEO Sam Altman said on a podcast last week that he wanted ChatGPT to become “people's personal AI subscription.”

items.title: A new wave of social media apps provide hope in a doomscrolling world
items.summary: “The platforms that won were the ones that kept people scrolling the longest, not the ones that made them feel the most connected,”  Zehra Naqvi told TechCrunch. “Now there is an abundance of content but a scarcity of joy.”

Hayden Field / The Verge:
Anthropic announces Skills for Claude, a tool with folders of instructions, scripts, and resources that Claude can load to improve performance on some tasks  —  The announcement follows a similar new tool from OpenAI. … AI agents spent years as a concept and then as an experiment.

items.title: How a headphone site operator built loyalty startup Lantern to solve his own problems
items.summary: After struggling to retain customers at his e-commerce site Headphones.com, founder Andrew Lissimore built his own loyalty solution — and it’s now a startup called Lantern. The Shopify-native platform helps brands boost retention through customizable loyalty, referrals, and account management tools.
